DataElement.preferredName: Collection Biospecimen Contact Information Email Address Email Address Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:Information regarding the means of contacting a person or group._An e-mail address identifies a location to which e-mail can be delivered. A modern Internet e-mail address (using SMTP) is a string of the form jsmith@domain.example. (from Wikipedia)_The string of characters that represents an electronic mail address. [Explanatory comment:  The format for this value domain is the SMTP standard local-part@domain]

Concepts.definition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
Information regarding the means of contacting a person or group.

Property.preferredDefinition: An e-mail address identifies a location to which e-mail can be delivered. A modern Internet e-mail address (using SMTP) is a string of the form jsmith@domain.example. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/30/14 DEC released per Ian Fore as part of Draft Model content review. jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The string of characters that represents an electronic mail address. [Explanatory comment:  The format for this value domain is the SMTP standard local-part@domain]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: contact information for communications over distance, including telephone and fax numbers, e-mail, and web addresses.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/22/22 jk added "Qualified" RS as part of MCL quarterly content review.
